org.eclipse.viatra.dse.base

Class DseActivationNotificationListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.dse.base.DseActivationNotificationListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.notification.IActivationNotificationListener

    public class DseActivationNotificationListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.viatra.transformation.evm.notification.IActivationNotificationListener
    This class is responsible for maintaining an activation - activation code bidirectional map for maintaining activation codes incrementally.
